doc: New render engine: Data context gets overwritten by the last instantiated template instance

in the latest `shark` branch, when setting something to the data context (e.g. in rendered: `this.data.myVar = 'whatever'`) and try to access it an event (e.g. `this.myVar`) it will be always the state of the _last_ template instance.
(i know you shouldn't write to the data context, from inside helper or rendered hooks, buts the only way for now to really pass a instance state)
I will try to create repro-repo if i have time.
